name: netherlands_songs
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool billboard_api.
Tool description: Providing the Billboard chart rankings and information on titles, artists, lyrics, images, and more. 
API description: Fetch the Netherlands Songs chart information from the Billboard API.

range.description: The range of the chart to fetch.

date.description: The date of the chart in the format 'YYYY-MM-DD'.
